Indian Economy.title: India’s GDP to grow 6.7-6.9% in FY26: Deloitte India

Startups & Funding.summary: AI automation firm’s Series F takes total funding to $870 million; top-tier tech giants join as strategic investors, keeping valuation steady at $2.5 billion.

Startups & Funding.title: Ranveer Singh-backed Super You protein snack firm looks to bulk up, eyes ₹150 cr
Startups & Funding.summary: The funding could help the protein snack firm achieve its  ₹500-crore revenue goal in the next five years. According to co-founder Nikunj Biyani, the firm’s revenue is already close to  ₹160 crore.

Startups & Funding.title: India’s B2C e-commerce sector secures $1.3 billion in 2025 funding: Tracxn report
Startups & Funding.summary: Spinny led 2025 funding with a $171 million Series F round, followed by jewellery brand GIVA’s $68 million and fintech firm TMRW’s $50 million Series C

Startups & Funding.title: Vizhinjam Port to use seaport-airport proximity to boost air-sea cargo
Startups & Funding.summary: Kerala’s Vizhinjam Port Phase-2, air-sea cargo synergy, and ₹500 crore Kaynes facility mark a new industrial growth era under ‘Vision 2031’ with BPCL startup support.

Startups & Funding.summary: The controversy has prompted over 1,000 founders and employees to sign an open letter urging Sequoia Capital to act, while others have defended Shaun Maguire’s right to free speech.

Banking & Finance.title: From next month you can have up to four nominees for your bank account and locker
Banking & Finance.summary: On Thursday the government said some key provisions of the Banking Laws (Amendment) Act, 2025, including changes to nomination guidelines, would come into effect from 1 November.

Banking & Finance.title: INDIA CM question settled, Tejashwi gets a shot in the arm, but the tougher test awaits
Banking & Finance.summary: Five years ago, the Mahagathbandhan fell short. As the RJD leader hopes to cross the line this time, he has the Opposition’s complete backing and the weight of the responsibility of leading it back to power.

Banking & Finance.title: RBI to mandate Unique Transaction Identifier for OTC derivatives from April 2026
Banking & Finance.summary: Covering rupee and foreign currency derivatives, forwards, and credit derivatives, the move aims to enhance transparency and align India’s reporting framework with global standards

Banking & Finance.title: Starting November 1, multiple nominees will be allowed for bank deposit accounts, lockers
Banking & Finance.summary: Starting November 1, depositors can nominate up to four individuals for bank accounts and lockers, enhancing claim settlement efficiency.

Technology Sector.title: Indian-origin New York resident Mehul Goswami arrested for stealing $50,000 from NY state while working two jobs
Technology Sector.summary: Goswami, 39, was employed by the New York State Office of Information Technology Services and he was allegedly simultaneously working in another job in Malta, investigators have said.

Technology Sector.title: ‘Criminal is sentenced to death’: What Bihar gangster Ranjan, killed in shootout, said in note after high-profile murder last month
Technology Sector.summary: Ranjan and three of his gang members were shot dead in a joint police operation in Delhi's Rohini on Thursday.

Technology Sector.title: As India looks to mandate AI content labelling, examining the growing menace of deepfakes
Technology Sector.summary: Companies like Meta and Google already have some form of AI labelling on their platforms, and ask the creator at the time of uploading a piece of content whether it was made using AI. But, enforcement remains patchy.

Technology Sector.title: AI is boosting the legacy business for top Indian IT firms, for now
Technology Sector.summary: Four major IT outsourcers report a rise in software modernization deals as companies automate IT tasks with AI. TCS and Infosys lead at a time US tariffs and higher H-1B visa costs pose a risk to Indian IT services providers.
